about_the_game:
ABOUT GAME

Prepare for endless battles in ARPICOS, which takes you into an underground world full of challenges and mysteries. Amidst the gloomy atmosphere, players will take on the role of a brave warrior on a brutal adventure. Survive as hundreds of demons creep from the darkness. All you can do is prolong your life by finding powerful equipment and a loyal pet to aid you in your journey.

Dive into the battlefield, level up, find great items, defeat formidable bosses, and stand your ground for as long as possible with your abilities..

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Gameplay

In ARPICOS, players must use strategy and their skills to survive in an underground world filled with challenges and mysteries. Players will take on the role of a brave warrior and battle against numerous demons emerging from the darkness.

Basic Gameplay:

  • Leveling Up:

Level up by battling increasingly stronger enemies.

Find powerful items and equipment to enhance combat abilities.

  • Defeating Bosses:

Fight formidable bosses .

Use strategic planning and special skills to defeat bosses and earn special rewards.

  • Pets and Empowerment:

Discover and hatch pet eggs to gain loyal companions.

Use pets to support you in battles.

  • Trading and Development:

Use the shop system to buy and sell new weapons and equipment.

  • Standing Your Ground:

Survive the onslaught of demons as they flood in.

Stand your ground as long as possible using all your strategic skills and abilities.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FEAATUER

  • Pet hatching system.

A system that introduces you to pets, which will enhance your Strength.

  • A shop system that allows you to sell and buy items.

You can buy new weapons, equipment, sell items, or repurchase them in this system.

  • Collect experience points to Get skill.

when you defeat monsters, you will gain EXP that you can collect to choose skills that will be randomly provided to you for convenience.

  • Defeat bosses to find the right pet companion.

When you defeat the boss of the map, you will receive an egg of your new companion, which will enhance your abilities.

  • You can choose to attack either in Auto mode or Manual mode.

  • Find the best weapons to combat the demons.

You will need to find weapons or purchase them to enhance your combat abilities.

  • Fight the final battle to survive as long as possible.

When the battle with everything is over, you will have to fight against the demons that will come flooding in to kill you. You must stand your ground for as long as possible.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Message from the Developers

This game was created with the dedication of a small group of students. We hope everyone enjoys the game and has a great time playing it.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

short_description: ARPICOS: A Rogue-lite game that takes you into an underground world full of challenges and mysteries. Take on the role of a brave warrior and face enemies in a dark and mysterious atmosphere. Travel through obstacles and use your fighting skills to survive each time you play again.
